mapper.sql: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, mem_membertype, mem_joindate from member
mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, mem_membertype, mem_joindate from ( select ceil(rownum/#{contentsPerPage}) page, mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, mem_membertype, mem_joindate from ( select mem_no, mem_id, mem_name, mem_birthdate, mem_email, mem_phoneno, mem_mileage, (select commoncode.cmn_code_kor from commoncode where commoncode.cmn_no = mem_membertype) mem_membertype, mem_joindate from member order by mem_no ) ) where page = #{pageNo}
select COP_NO, MEM_NO, COP_TYPE, COP_USED, COP_USEDATE from coupon
select m.mem_no, m.mem_id, m.mem_name, m.mem_birthdate, m.mem_email, m.mem_phoneno, m.mem_mileage, m.mem_membertype, m.mem_joindate from member m where ${searchType} like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPON(COP_NO, MEM_NO, COP_TYPE, COP_USED, COP_USEDATE) values(COUPON_SEQ.nextval,#{MemNo},#{coupType},#{coupUsed},#{coupUsedDate})
